LeftOuterJoinedMap

class LeftOuterJoinedMap<K : Any, A, B, C> : ReadOnlyBackedObservableMapBase<K, C, SimpleObjectProperty<B?>>

LeftOuterJoinedMap implements a special case of a left outer join where we're matching on primary keys of both tables.

Constructors

LeftOuterJoinedMap implements a special case of a left outer join where we're matching on primary keys of both tables.
